translation.Desc: I'm an aspiring software developer passionate about technology, always looking to learn and grow in the field.
translation.Desc2: I love challenges and I'm always looking for new knowledge to improve my skills, whether front-end or not.
translation.DescProj: Here are some of the projects I've been working on.
translation.notepadAppDescription: Notepad app | Flutter, Dart, Sqflite, Path and Path Provider
translation.ghibliAppDescription: App about Studio Ghibli films | Flutter, Dart, Cached Network Image, Dio and Shared Preferences
